page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: Gardening is the main hobby in summer with several green houses in the area.Other out door activities are bowling, cycling, walking, riding and fishing. Anglers catch trout and salmon both on Nith and Cairn, parts of which are let to Dumfries and Galloway angling association. Winter interests include the clubs in pages 2-3. In the home T.V.on various channels is watched- a few families have computers.Reading, sewing, knitting and playing cards are popular. {GOVERNMENT-}Our representatives are {EURO M.P. }Mr Alastair Hutton. {WESTMINSTER M.P.}Mr. Ian Lang. REGIONAL COUNCILLOR Mr Kenneth Kelly. DISTRICT COUNCILLOR Mr Joseph Dalziel. We have a local Community Council to attend to matters of local importance.
